403 — Forbidden

This means that access to the resource is forbidden for some reason. A common case for this is that: This App has not been deployed yet. Please push some code.

Other possibilities

  • The root path (doc root) is not configured correctly.
  • This App is currently updating, DNS can take a while.
  • A search engine directs to a deleted resource.
  • There is a typo in the address bar (URL).
  • Something else. Please check the fortrabbit status.
•fortrabbit — PHPower to the PHPeople
